summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackThe best-selling NYX Professional Makeup Slim Lip Pencil is a creamy long-lasting lip liner that makes lip shaping & coloring easier than ever!
details: DetailsBenefitsCreamy lip liner pencil that applies smoothly and is easy to blendThis long lasting lip liner does not tug, feather, bleed or fadeThe Slim Lip Pencil hydrates and conditions dry lips while increasing the wear and intensity of your lip colorBring shape and definition to your pout by lining lips with this holy grail lip pencil, or achieve a fuller lip look by overlining lips just above the natural lip line to get a plump, perfectly defined poutOR use the lip pencil to fill in lips & top off with any NYX Professional Makeup lip glossAvailable in many highly pigmented shades from orange to nude liner to traffic-stopping red lip linerSharpen this lip pencil with any regular pencil sharpenerCruelty freeKey IngredientsEnriched with moisturizing coconut oilItem 2226177How To UseLine upper and lower lips as desired. For a fuller lip look, overline lips just above the lip line with the Slim Lip Pencil. Use with any NYX Professional Makeup lipstick or lip gloss to complete your gorgeous lip look.IngredientsSorbitan Isostearate, Isocetyl Stearate,Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyethylene, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Unsaponifiables, Beeswax, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic / Capric Triglyceride, Nylon-12, Octyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Silica, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Hydrogenated, Coconut Oil, Tocopherol,VP / Hexadecene Copolymer, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Propylparaben, Prolylene Carbonate.
how_to_use: Line upper and lower lips as desired. For a fuller lip look, overline lips just above the lip line with the Slim Lip Pencil. Use with any NYX Professional Makeup lipstick or lip gloss to complete your gorgeous lip look.

reviews.headline: My favorite lip liners!!
reviews.comments: These lip liners are better than any other ive tried  regardless of price point. They have the perfect consistency for a lip liner not to creamy so they dont slide off but not to stiff either so its easy to apply

reviews.headline: Not only the color but the pencil itself lasts a long time
reviews.comments: This may sound crazy but my dogs name was Nutmeg and had just passed away. I was looking for a deeper lip liner. I liked this one and later saw its shade is Nutmeg. Goes. On smooth and beautiful shade of like a brownish auburn. It lasts a long time too

reviews.headline: A bit dry
reviews.comments: This lip liner is waterproof and will stay on good however it is dry going on so it does not glide across the lips smoothly. It is a little bit harder to put on but once you have it on, it's well worth it because it stays all day.

reviews.headline: Nyx liner
reviews.comments: I loveee all my nyx liners but the suede ones are wayyyy better!!!

reviews.headline: Perfect Formula!
reviews.comments: I love how smooth the product goes on and how it doesn't make my skin look red and irritated, but I was expecting a different color than the one that was applied, the packaging shows a slightly more nude, muted color than the actual pinky color. I would still buy again, just a different color.

reviews.headline: Overall an amazing product for the price
reviews.comments: I love how affordable these lipliners are and how they can be  long wearing.

reviews.headline: I would love buying it again
reviews.comments: True color soft no mess like it very much

reviews.headline: A perfect dupe for a Wednesday Addams lip
reviews.comments: I love NYX and their lip pencils never fail me!  I bought the color Currant - it is a dupe for M*C Nightmoth lip pencil.   I use it as an all-over color with a dab of lip balm.  Get it and save yourself $20!

reviews.headline: Why?!!!
reviews.comments: Not happy at all I got nude beige. It was always my go to color and it's not the same not at all.!  Why do that to a product that was so popular I will never ever understand you lost me as a customer. I've been a customer for 10+ years I'm afraid that now more shades that I like are not gonna be the same

reviews.headline: it's pretty good
reviews.comments: i got the shade nude pink but sadly it's more pink than nude. still cute tho

reviews.headline: Love NYX products
reviews.comments: My favorite lip liner right now!!!

reviews.headline: in love!
reviews.comments: so creamy and easy to put on! first time buying and i woule buy again

reviews.headline: Color
reviews.comments: I am sad to say that after ordering hot cocoa, it is not a deep dark brown. It is in fact, a dark purple and does not match the color that they have presented in the slides! So if you guys are looking for a brown, do not get hot cocoa!!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: i lovw this color sm not too dark but not too light

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: i lovw this color sm not too dark but not too light

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love it so much. Such a good product for the price, even if it were $10 it'd still be an amazing product. It blends really well and the color choices make such good lip combos.

reviews.headline: great
reviews.comments: i always buy this lipliner it's my favorite one

reviews.headline: Love NYXliners
reviews.comments: Best product, shades, and quality

reviews.headline: I love this color
reviews.comments: I get tons of compliments when I use this lip liner with ELF's Jam Session lip gloss

reviews.headline: Best liner ive tried
reviews.comments: I love this liner! I don't love the color i got, but thats my fault for buying a color i dont like. the formula is amazing! its very buttery and very easy to apply!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I fell in love with this lip liner a few years back, but finally branched out in colours and I'm so happy I did! Pale Pink is my go to colour for under almost all of my lipsticks on a regular basis. Not only does it help keep the lipstick in the lines(no running anywhere), but it also keeps my lipstick on through straws, food, and anything else that comes my way! The selection of colours is incredible and I love the consistency of the more matte ones! I'm not a big fan of the shiny ones(like Petal), but the matte ones are so creamy that sometimes I wear them alone!
faceoff_positive.headline: All Time Favourite!

faceoff_negative.comments: Have been buying Nude Beige for years, I liked that it was cool toned. The new formula is bright pink and very very dry. Will not buy again, very disappointed.
faceoff_negative.headline: Completely changed shade and terrible formula
